title: Possible command injection via Process.Start - mRemoteNG
author: Kvarkas
body_snippet:
Find more live information in Aikido here: https://app.aikido.dev/queue?sidebarIssue=16286739&groupId=38189&sidebarIssueTask=1728947&sidebarTab=tasks


### Scope
This task includes issues in the following code repository:
- mRemoteNG:
	[mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/AnyDesk/ProtocolAnyDesk.cs at line 257](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/blob/v1.78.2-dev/mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/AnyDesk/ProtocolAnyDesk.cs#L257)
	[mRemoteNG/Tools/ExternalTool.cs at line 171](https://github.com/mRe...

comments.snippet:
Update:

- Opened upstream PR with Process.Start hardening + related tests:
  - https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/3109

Scope covers command invocation hardening paths related to this issue.  
If maintainers confirm behavior on latest branch, this issue can be closed after merge.
comments.author: robertpopa22
